quotes: 7.7/10: too much Yamcha!
A dinosaur can't teach Yamcha how to ride a ball
A lion can eat Yamcha and still be hungry
A man once said: 'If you ain't first, you're Yamcha!'
A wild ENTEI appeared! Yamcha fled!
Abra used Teleport! Yamcha fainted!
Actually, Yamcha knows Instant Transmission. He can send his life to nowhere in an instant
All men are created equal... except Yamcha, he sucks!
An old lady helped Yamcha cross the street
Any person who finishes last still gets ahead of Yamcha
Braille can speak Yamcha
By singing, Yamcha can be shattered by glass
Dark Souls was originally named Yamcha's Life... but he couldn't get past the title screen
Due to censorship, it's common to replace terms related to death with 'being Yamcha-d'
Even Krillin thinks Yamcha stinks
Fighters train with punching bags the same way punching bags train with Yamcha
George Lucas followed Yamcha's advice. Then the prequels were made
God doesn't believe in Yamcha
For some reason, there's a locker named Yamcha. It never locks.
If Yamcha collects all dragon balls, he can make 0 wishes
If Yamcha gets robbed, he has to go to jail
If you commit a foul against Yamcha, your team can score a penalty
In fighting games, 'training mode' is commonly known as 'Yamcha'
In My Hero Academia, Yamcha's quirk is 'None for You'
In Ultra Instinct, Yamcha can defeat TWO Saibamen
Jobbers usually perform their finishing move on Yamcha. Six times
Life's got a restraining order on Yamcha

Negative numbers go from 0 to Yamcha
Neither Cell or Buu would ever risk absorbing Yamcha. They'd become weaker
On the streets, it's common for dogs to step on Yamcha
On a clown's birthday, Yamcha is usually hired to be made fun of
Pokémon is confused! Yamcha hurt himself in its confusion!

There was a time when Yamcha tried to capture a Pokémon. He caught himself
Tomorrow never dies... unless it's Yamcha!

Trash has to take out Yamcha once a week
VOLTORB used SELFDESTRUCT! Only YAMCHA fainted!
When a ghost dies, it becomes Yamcha
When kids misbehave in school, they have to sit in a corner and look at Yamcha
When Yamcha died, HELL was renamed Home For Infinite Losers (HFIL for short)
When Yamcha goes for a swim, he gets burned
When Yamcha prays to god, it's always the devil that answers
Whenever Yamcha buys Kinder Surprise, it comes with no toy

While you read this quote, Yamcha died... right after the first 'w'
Yamcha installed Chrome so that he could download Internet Explorer

Yamcha can own a mansion and remain homeless

Yamcha can win the lottery and still owe money for the ticket
Yamcha can't afford free stuff
Yamcha can't believe in the heart of the cards

Yamcha dies more than anyone's internet connection
Yamcha failed his driver's test to ride a shopping cart
Yamcha finished a time trial once. His time was infinity
Yamcha gets booed by Roman Reigns

Yamcha got fired from being unemployed

Yamcha lost a popularity contest... against $unpopular
Yamcha lost his virginity after his son
Yamcha needs a GPS system to get to the bathroom... from his bedroom
Yamcha ordered Coca-Cola Zero. He got regular Coke with his face on it

Yamcha stopped walking at the age of 1
Yamcha thinks wrestling is real

Yamcha watches tutorials on how to breathe... but he never managed to complete any of them
